profile:
When open, I tend to reply within a few days! (I try to reply to every email I get, but patience is greatly appreciated. Please send a follow up after a week if I haven't responded by then!)

I can usually find something of interest on any list! Feel free to reach out even if you don't have my wants :)

Trading Info

  • Started trading: Sep 2024

  • I prefer smaller scale trades, but I'm happy with large ones as well

  • Any MKV + VOB combination will be traded together, but videos with multiple release formats will generally be considered a 1:1 ratio per format. These are noted as such in my trader notes

  • I prefer to receive links through MEGA. I will accept Google Drive links, but MEGA is my preferred method

  • My links stay active for a week unless you tell me you need more time

Collection Info

  • Sizes are listed from my Mac, which is why file sizes are larger

  • I do my best to make sure everything is labelled correctly and not a rip, but there is a chance something is wonky. If you notice anything, please let me know so I can correct it!

  • Anything without a format has recently been added to my collection. These will be updated asap!

  • Audios are all listed with the amount of tracks I have, as well as non-DVD videos with multiple files (ex: the recording is split between two acts). Without the given indicator, you can assume there is only video one file for the performance. Audios will generally still have a "x1" in this case to minimize confusion
name: twigsaretasty
